items.title: Ce que tu trouveras ici
items.text:
• Une page À propos pour me présenter.
  • Une page Projets avec ce sur quoi je travaille.
  • Plus tard : un blog ou des notes techniques.

En savoir plus sur moi

items.title: Headers
items.text:
# H1 Header
## H2 Header
### H3 Header
#### H4 Header
##### H5 Header
###### H6 Header

items.title: Links and images
items.text:
[Link text](https://example.com)
[Link with title](https://example.com "Hover title")
![Alt text](image.jpg)
![Image with title](image.jpg "Image title")

items.title: Lists
items.text:
Unordered:
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Nested item

Ordered:
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

items.title: Blockquotes
items.text:
> This is a blockquote
> Multiple lines
>> Nested quote

items.title: Tables
items.text:
| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Row 1    | Data     | Data     |
| Row 2    | Data     | Data     |

items.title: Task lists
items.text:
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Incomplete task
- [ ] Another task

items.title: Line breaks
items.text:
End a line with two spaces  
to create a line break.

Or use a blank line for a new paragraph.
